Delve [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
Cycling {B}{G}{U} [i]({B}{G}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]
Whenever you cycle Underrock Adventurer, cleanse target artifact, creature, or enchantment. [i](Remove any number and/ or kind of counters from the target.)[/i]
